text: abo termination ms per for choosing company this email refers to your request cancel the subscription don worry understand your concern very well and will do my best to offer you the best possible solution due to the data protection regulations we are not allowed to delete accounts and subscriptions on behalf of our customers however you can unsubscribe at any time by taking the steps below via your company cell phone settings accenter payment and purchases subscriptions and tap the service whose subscription you want to cancel from your computer go to the official website register at https id cloud company com cas portal portal portal and then you can go to payments and purchases subscriptions password free payments and tap remove after the termination nothing will be debited from your account from the next month you can find more information about the deactivation of subscriptions at the following link https consumer company com en support content en us if you access our online portal via the browser of your phone please activate the desktop page first so that you can see the payment and purchases window if you need further support for your request for certain reasons please send us the following information your company id telephone number with the regional area code email address your concerns company cloud subscription terminate company music subscription company video subscription evidence of the transactions if your banking card is made with the bookings from company se and the last digits of your bank card if the payment is made with paypal screenshot of the payment with specification of the invoice number of transaction if the payment is made with your phone the telephone number that has been charged screenshot of the telephone bill which shows the fees of company se do not refer to contact us if we can also help you with friendly greeting per customer service the company se is society under irish law based in loc loc company se is the provider of company mobile services for company and honor device owners in loc loc loc loc and other countries termination sir or madam would like to cancel on the fastest possible date transaction numbe x last invoice numbe f i ask for confirmation sincerely patricia per

appgallery problems and suggestions please follow the steps below if the system keeps displaying message indicating that the app is being installed delete the downloaded app package or terminate the download task and try to install the app again to delete the app package open huawei appgallery go to me installation packages and delete the package in question to terminate the download task open huawei appgallery go to me installation manager and touch the download progress bar on the right of the app in question clear the cache of huawei appgallery and try to install the app from huawei appgallery again refer to step in what should do if can download an app in huawei appgallery check whether privatespace has been enabled by going to settings privacy privatespace or whether sub user has been created by going to settings users accounts if so disable it and try to install the app in question again restart your device connect it to another network and try to download and install the app again the cause of no certificate found is the app not be compatible with the device system the suggestion in the faq is when you search for the app check whether there is tag indicating whether the app is compatible with your device download the app after confirming that it is compatible also you can check and update your hms core by going to settings hms core check for updates we apologise for any inconvenience this process cause should you have any further questions please do not hesitate to contact us by replying to this mail sincerely madalin appgallery problems and suggestions problems and suggestions for choosing we hope that you are doing well am glad to assist you with your inquiry and will do my best to help you with your problem perform the following to troubleshoot clear the cache data of google play store and google play services note this action will clear your google account data it is recommended that you back up the data before doing so open settings search for apps go to more show system processes and touch google play store then go to storage clear data repeat the steps for google play services check whether your phone has good network connection it is recommended that you download the app in good network environment check whether digital balance student mode is enabled if yes open settings search for digital balance or student mode disable it and try again restart the device please do not hesitate to contact us if we can be your further assistance with kind regards ian appgallery problems and suggestions am finding it very difficult to access my google play store up sent from my honor phone
